com.opengamma.strata.market.curve.config

Interface CurveNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bean, ImmutableBean
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixedIborSwapCurveNode, FraCurveNode, IborFixingDepositCurveNode, TermDepositCurveNode

    public interface CurveNode
extends ImmutableBean
    A node in the configuration specifying how to calibrate a curve.

    A curve node is associated with an instrument and provides a method to create a trade representing the instrument.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CurveParameterMetadata metadata(LocalDate valuationDate)
      Returns metadata for the node.
      Set<ObservableKey> requirements()
      Returns requirements for the market data needed to build a trade representing the instrument at the node.
      Trade trade(LocalDate valuationDate, Map<ObservableKey,Double> marketData)
      Returns a trade representing the instrument at the node.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.joda.beans.Bean

        metaBean, property, propertyNames

      • trade

        Trade trade(LocalDate valuationDate,
            Map<ObservableKey,Double> marketData)
        Returns a trade representing the instrument at the node.
        Parameters:
        valuationDate - the valuation date used when calibrating the curve
        marketData - the market data required to build a trade for the instrument
        Returns:
        a trade representing the instrument at the node
